definitions.definition: A large room or building for indoor sports .
A type of secondary school in some European countries which typically prepares students for university .
A public place or building where Ancient Greek youths took exercise, with running and wrestling grounds, baths, and halls for conversation.

main_definition: ( formal ) A large room or building for indoor sports .
secondary_definitions: A type of secondary school in some European countries which typically prepares students for university .
( historical ) A public place or building where Ancient Greek youths took exercise, with running and wrestling grounds, baths, and halls for conversation.
